name: Sky Run
description:
What could be better than jumping from island to island being the fastest?

Sky Run is a platform game focused on competition between players posting your best times to see witch is the best. With amount of levels that are easy to complete in a first instance. The point of the game is found paths and tricks that allows you to be faster than the others.

Will you be able to find the best trace? Let's see what you are made of!

There will be a reward for the best! 

Social media
  • Discord will be available on 12th.
  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • Facebook
Development team

Sky Run was developed by Pol Ribera as producer and level designer, Oriol Prats as programmer and Roger Orensanz as main artist.
